channel.title: Making items donator points and pk points?
channel.description:
Hey guys
So i was wondering is it possible to have an item cost donator points, and pk points?
Like this
Whenever i compile i get an error saying multiple case's or whatever.
Any way to fix this?
Thanks :D
case 11694: // Donator points return 15;
and
case 11694: // Pk points return 250;

item.title: Making items donator points and pk points?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Fisher9696, post:6, topic:462354”]Nvm i found it out myself. I had to make a new get item value.

It was getSpecialItemValue(int id) {

I made a new one and named it getTheItemValue(int id) {
Then i changed it in the value of the store. Thanks for trying guys ^^[/quote]
YAY! Someone bothers to learn!

Read full topic
item.source: Making items donator points and pk points?

item.description:
@Fisher9696 wrote:

Nvm i found it out myself. I had to make a new get item value.

It was getSpecialItemValue(int id) {

I made a new one and named it getTheItemValue(int id) {
Then i changed it in the value of the store. Thanks for trying guys ^^

@Fisher9696 wrote:

Hey guys

So i was wondering is it possible to have an item cost donator points, and pk points?
